name: Bumper Balls.io
description:
The best .io game of the year is here for you! Bumper balls.io is the most addictive .io game all over the world. Drag your bumper ball and hit other enemy off the stage. Try to survive as long as possible, get bigger and stronger from eliminating the opponents! The last bumper ball standing will be the winner of the battle. Bumper others off and receive your victory!

Have fun playing Bumper Balls.io! It is completely free!
- Free to play, play it anywhere, anytime
- Suitable for all ages
- Customize your bumper ball’s skin and name
- Upgrade your bumper ball to be faster and stronger
- Knock all others out of the Arena!
- Now challenge and share it with your friends or family!
- Relax and enjoy
- Easy to start with but hard to master

You can play this .io game everywhere you want. The best .io game ever! You are gonna get bumped!
This game is fun and easy to play. It's a great game to kill time with, along with loads of different maps. Download it now to start bumping. We promise that once you start playing you'll never want to put your phone down.
